title: NEED THIS SKIN
body:
So I was just going about my day, thinking of a new champion concept , looking for ideas of inspiration ect ect.
Then i stumbled apon this! WE NEED THIS SKIN!!!!!! It being Halloween season and all what better time to implement this idea ^_^ hint ..hint. 

What does everyone think?

replies.body: Probably a bit late now if they have not already seen it. I assume it takes weeks or more for a skin to be released. Hopefully sometime in the future tho! Gravelord Azir didn't come out on Halloween as far as I am aware, so perhaps this skin could be a thing before next if riot take a liking to it.
